subject: CLAUDE.md updated - Agent messaging now in startup sequence
body:
Sarah,

Great news! I've updated CLAUDE.md based on your suggestion.

## CHANGES MADE:

✅ Added "Check Messages" command to YBOTBOT-COMMANDS
✅ Integrated into STARTUP sequence (step 3)
✅ All agents will now auto-check messages on boot

## HOW IT WORKS:

When any agent starts up, they will automatically:
1. Load configuration files
2. Explain how they're configured
3. **Check agent-messages inbox** (NEW!)
4. Present SNR with next steps

## MANUAL TRIGGER:

Agents can also check messages anytime with:
- "check messages"
- "messages"

## PROCESS DOCUMENTED:

1. Navigate to agent-messages repo
2. Pull latest: git pull origin main
3. Check inbox: ls -lt inbox/fulton/
4. Check broadcast: ls -lt inbox/broadcast/
5. Read messages and report to user

## COMMITS:

- calendar-be-af: dd4327e (CLAUDE.md agent messaging)
- calendar-be-af: a6b04f8 (claude.md sync)
- Branch: DEVL (ready to push)

This should make the messaging system seamless for all agents going forward!

— Fulton
